Package ingramj.particle

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ingramj.particle.Particle
  • public class Particle
extends java.lang.Object
    A particle for use in Particle Swarm Optimisation
    Author:
    ingramj

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Particle​(int numberOfGoods, PricingProblem problem, double[] coefficients)
      Creates a particle and sets its initial position and velocity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double[] calculateNewVelocity()
      Calculates the new velocity by summing inertia, social attraction and cognitive attraction
      double[] getPersonalBestPricing()
      Returns personal best pricing
      double getPersonalBestResult()
      Returns personal best result
      void searchSpace()
      Updates the particle's position and checks if it's better than the previous position.
      void setGlobalBest​(double[] pricing, double result)
      Sets global best solution.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Particle

        public Particle​(int numberOfGoods,
                PricingProblem problem,
                double[] coefficients)
        Creates a particle and sets its initial position and velocity.
        Parameters:
        numberOfGoods - The number of goods in the pricing problem
        problem - The pricing problem
        coefficients - The coefficients used to calculate future positions of the particle.

    • Method Detail

      • searchSpace

        public void searchSpace()
        Updates the particle's position and checks if it's better than the previous position.

      • calculateNewVelocity

        public double[] calculateNewVelocity()
        Calculates the new velocity by summing inertia, social attraction and cognitive attraction
        See Also:
        calculateInertia(), calculateCognitiveAttraction(), calculateSocialAttraction()

      • getPersonalBestPricing

        public double[] getPersonalBestPricing()
        Returns personal best pricing

      • getPersonalBestResult

        public double getPersonalBestResult()
        Returns personal best result

      • setGlobalBest

        public void setGlobalBest​(double[] pricing,
                          double result)
        Sets global best solution.
        Parameters:
        pricing - The current pricing of the global best
        result - The current result of the global best

      • updateCoefficients

        public void updateCoefficients​(double[] updatedCoefficients)
        Updates the values of the inertia, cognitive and social coefficients
        Parameters:
        updatedCoefficients - The new values for the coefficients [inertia, cognitive, social].
